title: New: Death Grips – Exmilitary Mixtape
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/Death-Grips-Exmilitary-Large.jpg "Death-Grips---Exmilitary-Large")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/7654-new-death-grips-exmilitary-mixtape/attachment/death-grips-exmilitary-large/)

I really wanted to review this Mixtape, but as we all know [_Goblins_](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/7544-opinion-2-jc-tyler-the-creator-%E2%80%93-goblin) have been creeping around CITR towers and it’s been hard to do anything but debate over those little fuckers. However, amongst the chaos a genuine masterpiece has emerged.

[Zach Hill](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zach_Hill) of Sacramento, CA. is the mastermind behind the group; taking influences from hip-hop, hardcore, breakbeats and dupstep to form something that feels genuinely like a kick to the cunt. It’s intense and fucked up, brutal and painful; it’s utterly fucking disturbing. Get ready to whimper like a bitch. Download it bellow.

 [Death Grips – Exmilitary](http://soundcloud.com/deathgrips/sets/death-grips-exmilitary) by [deathgrips](http://soundcloud.com/deathgrips)
